  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action 
    Class and Description
    BristlebackConfig
    Bristleback Server configuration, containing all basic server components.
    ConfigurationAware
    This marker interface indicates that given implementing component (or extending interface) requires Bristleback configuration.
    DataController
    Data controller processes incoming text and binary data.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.extractor 
    Class and Description
    BristlebackConfig
    Bristleback Server configuration, containing all basic server components.
    ConfigurationAware
    This marker interface indicates that given implementing component (or extending interface) requires Bristleback configuration.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api 
    Class and Description
    BristlebackConfig
    Bristleback Server configuration, containing all basic server components.
    ConfigurationAware
    This marker interface indicates that given implementing component (or extending interface) requires Bristleback configuration.
    DataController
    Data controller processes incoming text and binary data.
    SerializationEngine
    This interface provides functionality for converting between java objects/primitives and other formats, like JSON or XML.
    SerializationResolver
    Serialization information resolvers cooperate with SerializationEngine implementations by providing meta information about serialized/deserialized type for them.
    ServerEngine
    This interface is a most important part of connection module.
    WebsocketConnector
    Websocket connector is an abstract representation of single client connection.
    WebsocketMessage
    Low level WebSockets message used by a Server Engine.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurationAware
    This marker interface indicates that given implementing component (or extending interface) requires Bristleback configuration.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.app 
    Class and Description
    BristlebackConfig
    Bristleback Server configuration, containing all basic server components.
    InitialConfigurationResolver
    Implementations of this interface resolve configuration settings from source provided by application creator.
  • Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api used by pl.bristleback.server.bristle.conf 
    Class and Description
    BristlebackConfig
    Bristleback Server configuration, containing all basic server components.
    DataController
    Data controller processes incoming text and binary data.
    MessageDispatcher
    Message dispatcher is responsible for collecting all outbound messages and sending them in thread safe way.

    This interface provides functionality for converting between java objects/primitives and other formats, like JSON or XML.
    ServerEngine
    This interface is a most important part of connection module.

    Class and Description
    ConnectionStateListener
    This interface is meant to be implemented by application creator to handle user connection and disconnection events.
